plot outline: WELL DONE BABY is about how a modern young couple of today fails to find purpose in their relationship till destiny decides to give them one, in the form of a baby. And how this in itself brings a new set of experiences, conflicts and challenges. Not to mention another massive challenge in the form of Aditya's intrusive, traditional and obnoxious mother in law, Nirmala. It humorously makes a statement, on how couples are becoming obsessive about having what they call a 'designer baby' and how this is giving rise to several fads and modern day superstitions too . And how, at the end of the day, clichés like - A child can mend a broken marriage or a baby gives birth to the parents, etc. which have been quoted and passed on since generations still stand true and always would, the way they did with Aditya and Meera.
title: Well Done Baby
plot: _Well Done Baby_ (qv) is about how a modern young couple of today fails to find purpose in their relationship till destiny decides to give them one.

WELL DONE BABY is about how a modern young couple of today fails to find purpose in their relationship till destiny decides to give them one, in the form of a baby. And how this in itself brings a new set of experiences, conflicts and challenges. Not to mention another massive challenge in the form of Aditya's intrusive, traditional and obnoxious mother in law, Nirmala. It humorously makes a statement, on how couples are becoming obsessive about having what they call a 'designer baby' and how this is giving rise to several fads and modern day superstitions too . And how, at the end of the day, clichés like - A child can mend a broken marriage or a baby gives birth to the parents, etc. which have been quoted and passed on since generations still stand true and always would, the way they did with Aditya and Meera.
